channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Using FreeBSD to make self-hosting fun again
item.description:
So I could also have just gathered that information on the CLI, oh well. What is important is that I'm having fun, learning a new thing, right now. I'll see what sticks long-term.

item.title: Linux gamers on Steam cross over the 3% mark
item.description:
Linux gamers on Steam as of the Steam Hardware & Software Survey for October 2025 have crossed over the elusive 3% mark. Source: Valve Article taken from GamingOnLinux. _Mars 7 hours ago Flag Link I'm glad that the Steam Deck only makes up a fraction of the userbase.

Read more

item.title: Reproducing the AWS Outage Race Condition with a Model Checker
item.description:
It then applies the plan and invokes a clean-up process. We’ll create a DNS Planner process that produces plans, and DNS Enactor processes that pick them up. The incident report also notes that the clean-up process deletes plans that are “significantly older than the one it just applied.

item.title: 'This is the big one' – tech firms bet on electrifying rail
item.description:
Not only that, Mr Murray says it is currently the only solar array in the country that delivers power directly to rail to move trains. To go electric, rail operators have traditionally had two options: electrified rail, or overhead lines that that trains connect to with arm-like pantographs on their roofs. This is why he views solar panels as so useful in enabling railway electrification projects.

Read more

item.title: MTurk is 20 years old today – what did you create with it?
item.description:
It took a few days for people to find it and catch on, but then things got busy. At the time, AWS was about 100 people (when you were on call, you were on call for all of AWS), Amazon had just hit 10,000, S3 was still in private beta, and EC2 was a whitepaper. What did you create with MTurk and the incredibly patient hard-working workforce behind it.

Read more

item.title: React-Native-Godot
item.description:
Born React Native Godot React Native Godot allows embedding the Godot Engine into React Native applications. sh yarn ios # or yarn android Your first React Native Godot App Born React Native Godot is distributed on NPM. Import React Native Godot in your App code import { RTNGodot, RTNGodotView, runOnGodotThread } from "@borndotcom/react-native-godot"; Add the Godot View to your view, e.
